div.p: Thermocline (20°C isotherm depth, m) during El Niño developing years (1970–2010). a Meridional distribution (along 135°–170°E) in J–A–S. b As in a, but for O–N–D. c, Zonal distribution (along 5°S–5°N) in J–A–S. d As in c, but for O–N–D. The blue dashed line indicates the original thermocline; the red line associated with the preceding WNP ACE signal in J–A–S, and the thicker line indicates significance above the 95% confidence level. An El Niño developing year is defined when the above-moderate El Niño events (including moderate events) develops from weak to strong
